rooms.name: Winter Wonderland
rooms.description: You enter a cold, barren winter wonderland. There doesn't seem to be much here

rooms.name: Space Station
rooms.description: Suddenly you arrive in a space station. You see aliens around you.

rooms.name: Castle
rooms.description: A large castle appears in the distance in front of you.

rooms.name: Tundra
rooms.description: You walk on to a barren tundra.

rooms.name: Forest
rooms.description: You sprint through a lush forest filled with all kinds of wildlife.

rooms.name: Village
rooms.description: You walk into a bustling village. You spot something shiny out of the corner of your eye.

rooms.name: Dry Desert
rooms.description: You stumble into a really dry desert. It's so hot here.

rooms.name: Desert
rooms.description: You stumble into a desert. It's pretty hot here.

rooms.name: Treasure Room
rooms.description: You found the treasure! Your reward is being able to complete this level. Simply type the magical function, win(8675309) to complete this level!
